Topic 5: Voice Conversion and audio generation . topic 5: audio generation and voice conversion . topics include audio generation, voice generation, and audio .
aims to modify an existing voice to resemble another while retaining original content and linguistic features . uses cases: • Speaker imitation, accent conversion, emotion/style transfer .
translates voice characteristics from one speaker to another . uses adversarial training to learn mapping between different voice domains without paired data .
input and Output: • May take various forms of input (e.g., text, noise) • Entirely new audio signals as output .
audioLDM2 transforms noise into coherent audio by iteratively refining the signal (diffusion-based approach) audio samples at https://audioldm.github.io .

input: Modified speech with a different voice but same content . output: Text, musical notes, sound description, etc. Output: Existing speech signal . Content generation does not generate new content (content-preserving).
